com.milk.uberchat.gui
Class MasterControl

java.lang.Object
  |
  +--com.milk.uberchat.gui.MasterControl
All Implemented Interfaces:
ErrorListener, java.util.EventListener, MessageListener
public class MasterControl
extends java.lang.Object
implements ErrorListener, MessageListener

This is the master control object for UberChat.

Author:
Dan Bornstein, danfuzz@milk.com
, Copyright 1999 Dan Bornstein, all rights reserved.
